title: Global Finance Magazine Names Citi "Best Foreign Exchange Bank and Provider" in Latin America for Eighth Consecutive Year
summary: Miami, Florida - Citi has been named by Global Finance magazine as the "Best Foreign Exchange Bank and Provider" in Latin America for the eighth consecutive year. As part of the magazine's World's Best Foreign Exchange and Provider 2013 Awards, Citi was also recognized as "Best Foreign Exchange Bank and Provider" in Argentina, Costa Rica, Ecuador, El Salvador, Guatemala, Honduras Uruguay, and Mexico (Banamex).
tag-1: Global Finance Magazine Names Citi "Best Foreign Exchange Bank and Provider" in Latin America for Eighth Consecutive Year
tag-2: Miami, Florida – Citi has been named by Global Finance magazine as the "Best Foreign Exchange Bank and Provider" in Latin America for the eighth consecutive year. As part of the magazine's World's Best Foreign Exchange and Provider 2013 Awards, Citi was also recognized as "Best Foreign Exchange Bank and Provider" in Argentina, Costa Rica, Ecuador, El Salvador, Guatemala, Honduras Uruguay, and Mexico (Banamex).
tag-3: "Citi's continued recognition in these prestigious awards, both at a regional and country level, distinguish the sustained efforts made to deliver the best solutions to our clients. We are very proud of the recognitions received and continue committed to providing best in class products and services to our institutional and corporate clients in the region to fulfill their Foreign Exchange needs," said Jaime Roblesgil, Head of Citi Markets, Citi Latin America.
tag-4: According to Global Finance, its editors – with input from industry analysts, corporate executives and technology experts – also selected the best currency trading providers in 97 countries or regions. Criteria for choosing the traditional and online winners included transaction volume, market share, scope of global coverage, customer service, competitive pricing and innovative technologies.
tag-5: Highlights of Global Finance World's Best Foreign Exchange Banks and Providers received by Citi:
tag-6: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
